Name: Fine Forgestone
Description: Used for refining rings, Bracelet (L)s, Bracelet (R)s, and Charm parts to improve their performance.
Description$english: Used for refining rings, Bracelet (L)s, Bracelet (R)s, and Charm parts to improve their performance.
Description2$english: A unique composite material made by heritage Forging techniques, covered with strange topological patterns, making it easy to cut, and thus often used to finely forge precious objects.

recipes.Name: Fine Forgestone
recipes.Des: Use Luna Ore to create Fine Forgestone for Refine, which can refine rings, Bracelet (L)s, Bracelet (R)s, and Charms to enhance their performance.
recipes.Des$english: Use Luna Ore to create Fine Forgestone for Refine, which can refine rings, Bracelet (L)s, Bracelet (R)s, and Charms to enhance their performance.

recipes.Name: Fine Forgestone - Beginner
recipes.Des: Use Luna Ore to create Fine Forgestone for Refine, which can refine rings, Bracelet (L)s, Bracelet (R)s, and Charms to enhance their performance.
recipes.Des$english: Use Luna Ore to create Fine Forgestone for Refine, which can refine rings, Bracelet (L)s, Bracelet (R)s, and Charms to enhance their performance.

NeedMaterial.Name: Luna Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After smelting, it can be converted into Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The surface shimmers with a soft and unique luster. When the light changes, this luster dances along, as if there is a mysterious power flowing inside the ore.

NeedMaterial.Name: Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder
NeedMaterial.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

recipes.Name: Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder ×15
recipes.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.
recipes.Des$english: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

NeedMaterial.Name: Charcoal
NeedMaterial.Description: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

recipes.Name: Charcoal ×10
recipes.Des: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!
recipes.Des$english: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

NeedMaterial.Name: Pine Timber
NeedMaterial.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Available exclusively through merchants from alternative regions, as pine timber is protected in Asteria Plains.

recipes.Name: Fine Forgestone - Master
recipes.Des: Producing Fine Forgestone with Luna Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, Bracelet (L), Bracelet (R), and charms.
recipes.Des$english: Producing Fine Forgestone with Luna Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, Bracelet (L), Bracelet (R), and charms.

NeedMaterial.Name: Luna Rich Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into a larger quantity of Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After smelting, it can be converted into a larger quantity of Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english:
The surface shimmers with a soft and unique luster. When the light changes, this luster dances along, as if there is a mysterious power flowing inside the ore.
Rich ores usually appear in clusters and have a much higher mineral content than ordinary raw stones, but their yield is lower, making them naturally more expensive.

recipes.Name: Fine Forgestone - Master
recipes.Des: Producing Fine Forgestone with Luna Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, Bracelet (L), Bracelet (R), and charms.
recipes.Des$english: Producing Fine Forgestone with Luna Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, Bracelet (L), Bracelet (R), and charms.

NeedMaterial.Name: Luna Pure Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into an even larger quantity of Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After smelting, it can be converted into an even larger quantity of Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english:
The surface shimmers with a soft and unique luster. When the light changes, this luster dances along, as if there is a mysterious power flowing inside the ore.
High-precision ores usually appear in areas with high Engram concentration. Some refined ores will crystallize, having a much higher content than ordinary raw stones, making them very rare.
